remarks: Generalized triangle inequality: the absolute value of a finite sum is less than or equal to the sum of absolute values.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumabs.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumabs.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumabs $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` sum_ k e. A B ) <_ sum_ k e. A ( abs ` B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
